reviewText: If you are interested in learning ASL these are awesome. Not just for kids. Great for adults too.

Of course I own this!  I own every single item produced by Signing Time!  They are phenomenal!  If you're looking to learn ASL or to teach your child ASL, look no farther.  Signing Time is a fun, easy, fast, entertaining way to learn ASL.  Both of my kids were signing by age 9 months!  Fantastic product!

Great Video. This DVD helps children learn ASL in a unique way. I have nine children ages 8-17 and they all love the video. I bought the DVD's to help an nonspeaking autistic child to communicate. I did not expect that my older children would love it.
